name: @shaneholloman/aria-bridge
description: Development-only bridge for capturing errors and logs in web, Node, and React Native

scripts.sdk:python: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; cd python && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null && python3 -m pip install . >/dev/null && ARIA_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 ARIA_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret PYTHONPATH=$PWD python3 -m pytest tests; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:go: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; cd go && ARIA_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 ARIA_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret go test ./...; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:php: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; cd php && composer install --no-interaction --no-progress && ARIA_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 ARIA_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret php tests/smoke.php; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:ruby: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; export GEM_HOME="$(ruby -r rubygems -e "print Gem.user_dir")"; export PATH="$GEM_HOME/bin:$PATH"; gem install bundler --no-document --user-install >/dev/null && cd ruby && bundle config set path vendor/bundle >/dev/null && bundle install --quiet && ARIA_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 ARIA_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret bundle exec ruby tests/smoke.rb; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
scripts.sdk:rust: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; cd rust && cargo test -- --nocapture; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'

scripts.sdk:java: sh -c 'bun install --frozen-lockfile --production >/dev/null && node tools/protocol-test-server.js --port=9877 --secret=dev-secret >/tmp/cb-server.log 2>&1 & pid=$!; node tools/wait-for-port.js 9877 || exit $?; cd java && ARIA_BRIDGE_URL=ws://localhost:9877 ARIA_BRIDGE_SECRET=dev-secret mvn -q test; status=$?; kill $pid || true; exit $status'
